      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletionStage<LocalAsyncResult<R>> LocalCall.callAsync(SaltClient client, Target<?> target, AuthMethod auth)
      Calls a execution module function on the given target asynchronously and returns information about the scheduled job that can be used to query the result.
      CompletionStage<Map<String,CompletionStage<Result<R>>>> LocalCall.callAsync(SaltClient client, Target<?> target, AuthMethod auth, EventStream events, CompletionStage<GenericError> cancel)
      Calls this salt call via the async client and returns the results as they come in via the event stream.
      CompletionStage<Map<String,Result<R>>> LocalCall.callSync(SaltClient client, Target<?> target, AuthMethod auth)
      Calls a execution module function on the given target and synchronously waits for the result.
      CompletionStage<List<Map<String,Result<R>>>> LocalCall.callSync(SaltClient client, Target<?> target, AuthMethod auth, Batch batch)
      Calls a execution module function on the given target with batching and synchronously waits for the result.
